comment.author: 24469639@N00
comment._content: Lovely image. If I had to guess, then from working out the signs and the relative positioning of the locations mentioned, I'd say there's a fair bet this is at Drouin West - see the middle of this map, which also shows all the places mentioned on the sign. maps.google.co.uk/maps?q=drouin&hl=en&ll=-38.0826... Possibly a complete coincidence but today there's a school right there.

comment.author: 77541634@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/whatsthatpicture] That's my guess too. Right on the corner of Main Neerim Road & Old Sale Road
